data.text: Micheal Lee Bauer died July 12, 2008 after a short illness. Micheal was born on January 29, 1958 in Carroll, IA. He grew up and went to school in Coon Rapids. For the last several years Micheal resided in Kansas City, MO. He as employed by LatteLand Espresso and Tea. Micheal was preceded in death by his mother, Pauline Lambert Bauer, and two brothers, Bill and Larry Bauer. Survived by his father, Don Bauer, Creston, IA; brother, Steve Bauer and family of Coon Rapids; sister, Debbie Springer and family, Creston, IA; his partner Thad Clark, Kansas City, MO, two greyhounds, Angela and Lear, and many aunts, uncles, nieces, nephews and friends. Graveside services in IA; memorial service in Kansas City pending.
